title: Himi 657
lyrics:
M.NG. loua
1.
Sihova Sāpaoti ē, Hau ‘o e
ngaahi hau,
Ko Ho taloni ‘oku tu’u he
taukakapa fau;
‘Oku mau kau mo e ‘āngelo he hiva
ta’etūkua,
Mo fakamālo atu ki he tupu’i
‘Otua.
2.
Mei ‘Isipite na’a Ke ‘omi Ho
kakai ‘i mu’a;
Tataki ‘i Toafa ē, mo ‘ange
ha fonua;
Ko Tonga foki kuo ma’u ‘inasi
mo tofi’a,
He hala ‘emau fakafeta’i mo
fakafiefia?
3.
Neongo ko e ki’i kakai he
tapa ‘o māmani,
Mama’o mei he ū fonua mālohi
mo masani,
Ko hai ‘e lau homau koloa kuo
Ke laku mai;
Me’a ‘a sino laumālie mo e
‘atamai.
4.
Malo he ‘omi ha fonua fe’unga
mo e kakai,
Ma’ungofua he me’a kotoa ke
inu pē mo kai,
Ko e kelekele mahu ē pea ka
hala ia
‘E lau ‘e hai homau koloa
‘e ma’u mei tahi na.
5.
Mālo pe tokonaki ma’a homau
‘atamai:
Ko e poto kehekehe ‘oku mau
‘atā ki ai;
Pea ‘ikai ia ko ia pē, ka ko e
me’a tēpū
‘A e me’akai ‘a Laumālie kuo
Ke ‘osi teu.
6.
Sihova Sāpaoti ē, ‘a e Tupu’i
‘Otua,
Malo Ho’ ofa kuo fai talu mei
mu’a ‘i mu’a.
Tau kau mo koe he kaha’u, pea
‘e hulu noa
‘A e monū’ia mo e lelei ‘a Tonga
manakoa. *
